response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for us. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth every penny of the $1,200,000 it represents to you. Considering the high demand and limited availability, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $1,150,000? This offer is valid for a limited time only, so please let me know if you wish to proceed. We are confident that you will find this investment to be highly rewarding.", "product_price": 1150000}
